name: Uta
text: When Attacking: You may trash 1 FILM type card from your hand: Give up to one of your opponents' characters -2000 power until the end of turn. Then, add up to 1 DON!! from your DON!! deck as rested.

effect.text: You may trash 1 FILM type card from your hand: Give up to one of your opponents' characters -2000 power until the end of turn. Then, add up to 1 DON!! from your DON!! deck as rested.
